com.mortardata.api.v2
Class Jobs

java.lang.Object
  com.mortardata.api.v2.Jobs

public class Jobs
extends Object

Run and fetch jobs from the Mortar API.

See Also:
http://help.mortardata.com/reference/api/api_version_2

getJobs

public Jobs.JobsList getJobs(Integer skip,
                             Integer limit)
                      throws IOException
Get a subset of jobs from the API.

Parameters:
skip - Number of jobs to skip (jobs sorted in desc order of startTimestamp)
limit - Maximum number of jobs to return
Returns:
list of Jobs
Throws:
IOException - if unable to fetch data from the API

               throws IOException
Run a new Job.

Parameters:
jobRequest - Info about job to run
Returns:

Throws:

public Jobs.JobStatus getJobStatus(String jobId)

Get the status of Job.

Parameters:

Returns:
status of the job
Throws:

blockUntilJobComplete

public Jobs.JobStatus blockUntilJobComplete(String jobId)
                                     throws IOException,
                                            InterruptedException
Block until a job has completed, polling for status.

Parameters:
jobId - ID of job to wait for completion
Returns:
final statusCode
Throws:
IOException - if unable to contact API for status
InterruptedException - if polling interrupted
